meanings.definition: To remove from a list or roster.
meanings.sent1: The teacher decided to delist the student from the class roster.
meanings.sent2: They will delist the old products to make room for new ones.
meanings.sent3: The delisting of the noisy student brought peace to the classroom.
meanings.sent4: After delisting the outdated items, the store looked more organized.
meanings.sent5: The delisting process was quick and efficient, clearing up space for new entries.

meanings.definition: The action of removing from a list or roster.
meanings.sent1: The delisting of the company from the stock exchange surprised many investors.
meanings.sent2: Delisting can have various implications for businesses and investors.
meanings.sent3: The delisting of the unpopular menu item was met with relief by the customers.
meanings.sent4: The delisting of the team captain caused a stir among the players.
meanings.sent5: The sudden delisting of the song from the playlist left the listeners puzzled.
